main event: A witness in Anderson, Indiana observed 2-3 white, cast-like objects falling to the ground on November 18, 1957.
interesting points: The objects grew in size as they approached the ground and were described as very bright.
The objects moved in a straight line and the observation lasted for about 15 minutes.
The witness was trying to check the motions and behavior of the objects at night when they were first noticed.
The witness was not sure of the exact speed or distance of the objects.
This was not the first time the witness had seen similar objects.
